description: I recently met our brand new recruit, Gage while I was out shopping. In his video, I joke with Gage about how it looks like he jumped right off a package of underwear. In fact, I told him I might have wished him to life. We just laugh and we find out that Gage is 22 years old, stands 5'9' and weighs 160 lbs. He also likes to swim, run and rock climb ... and is always looking for a new experience.I tell him we have many new experiences on the menu around here, but that usually the cook is only cooking one thing. I stop short of telling him the main dish and leave him to his own devices for a bit. He enGAGEs us with his ripped abs and super nice cock and that pretty ass all the way to a cumshot. Be sure not to miss out on Gage's first appearance as you'll be seeing much more of him around here in the future.
title: Gage, Scene #01
